name: LP Boost γ (Duel Links Skill)
text: (This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
skill_activation: Flip this card over at the start of the Duel.
skill_effect: Increase your starting Life Points by 2500, but reduce your starting hand by 2 cards.
